messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. From Pam what is the shortest path to Zack? Starting from Pam, please list the scholar names in order, including Pam, separated by commas.

First, I will start with Pam. From the information given, Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. 

Next, I will check the connections of each of these scholars to see if any of them are directly connected to Zack. From the information given, none of these scholars are directly connected to Zack.

Then, I will check the connections of the scholars connected to the scholars Pam is connected to. Jing is connected to Raj, Wei, Reza, Wim and Nisha. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Puja is connected to Pari. 

From this information, none of the scholars connected to the scholars Pam is connected to are directly connected to Zack.

Next, I will check the connections of the scholars connected to the scholars connected to the scholars Pam is connected to. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva.

From this information, Matt is connected to Eva, who is connected to Zack. Therefore, the shortest path from Pam to Zack is through Jing, Raj, Wei, Eva, and Matt.

Answer: Pam, Jing, Raj, Wei, Eva, Matt, Zack.

expected_answer: Answer: Pam, Kim, Pari, Amy, Zack
Answer: Pam, Ian, Pari, Amy, Zack
Answer: Pam, Moin, Pari, Amy, Zack
